# Use case: Demonstrating Business Observability System (BOS) methodology

# services.csv - Core service information owned by Product Owner
# service_id: Unique identifier for the service (e.g.
# serviceName: Technical name used in systems (e.g.
# businessPurpose: What the service does for the business in plain language
# tierLevel: Criticality from 1 (most critical) to 6 (least critical)
# performanceQuestion: The key question this service's SLO answers
# productOwner: Email of the responsible Product Owner
